test.name: 登入到基金交易成功測試

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://appium.io/docs/en/2.1/cli/args/ | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias | | strict_ssl | No | allows you to send commands to an invalid certificate host like a self-signed one. |

kw.name: Start Screen Recording
kw.doc: Starts an asynchronous Screen Recording for the current open application.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'E151798250' into text field 'xpath=//android.widget.EditText[@text="ID/統一編號"]'
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'a12345' into text field 'xpath=//android.widget.EditText[@text="6~20 位使用者代碼"]'
xpath criteria: //android.widget.EditText[@text="6~20 位使用者代碼"]
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'b12345' into text field 'xpath=//android.widget.EditText[@text="6~20 位網路密碼"]'
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Stop Screen Recording
kw.doc: Gathers the output from the previously started screen recording to a media file, then embeds it to the log.html(Android Only).
